caption.p: Relationship between field‐based observations of pika activity, minimum above‐talus temperature, elevation, and slope aspect. The top graph (A) shows model‐averaged predicted regression surfaces at three temperatures: 25% quartile, mean, and 75% quartile. Beta coefficients and 85% confidence intervals (Arnold 2010) are shown (B) following model averaging, and for the (C) top‐ranked model, (D) second‐ranked model, and (E) third‐ranked model.
